Address.label: Address
Address.value: 2929 CALIFORNIA STREET, TORRANCE, California, 90503, United States

CompanyDescription.label: Company Description
CompanyDescription.value: Motorcar Parts of America Inc is a us-based manufacturer, remanufacturer, and distributor of aftermarket automotive and light truck applications. It manufactures and distributes heavy-duty truck and industrial and agricultural application parts. It produces starter engines, alternators, hub assemblies, bearings, and master cylinders. The company supplies its products to the automotive aftermarket either under its own brands, as part of a private-label service, or to warranty replacement programs of automobile manufacturers. It primarily sells rotating electrical products, wheel hub products, brake master cylinders products in the us, of which a majority of the revenue is derived from the sales of rotating electrical products.
